    • Method Detail

      • createPixelsWriter

        protected PixelsWriter createPixelsWriter(ImageInfo imginfo)
        Description copied from class: PngWriter
        Factory method for pixels writer. This will be called once at the moment at start writing a set of IDAT chunks (typically once in a normal PNG) This should be overriden if custom filtering strategies are desired. Remember to release this with close()
        Overrides:
        createPixelsWriter in class PngWriter
        Parameters:
        imginfo - Might be different than that of this object (eg: APNG with subimages)
        Returns:
        new PixelsWriter. Don't forget to call close() when discarding it

      • getPixelWriterMultiple

        public PixelsWriterMultiple getPixelWriterMultiple()
